rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: No human cases have been documented from this strain of the avian flu in the U.S., and only one has been reported in Europe, said Todd Davis, lead of the CDC's zoonotic virus team in virology surveillance.

rationale: The segment contains explicit calming language ('No human cases', 'only one'), which would be handled by a lower-precedence rule (Q5).
